description:
High school student Tatsumi lives alone. One day he spots a person while walking by a river. He approaches the figure and discovers a beautiful man collapsed on the ground.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La situation particulière de ma baignoire
The Special Circumstances of My Bathtub
Uchi no Furo no Tokushuna Jijou
ウチのフロの特殊な事情
